dt: {bc}a substance used (as in detecting or measuring a component, in preparing a product, or in developing photographs) because of its chemical or biological activity

et: New Latin {it}reagent-, reagens{/it}, present participle of {it}reagere{/it} to react {ma}{mat|react|}{/ma}
shortdef: a substance used (as in detecting or measuring a component, in preparing a product, or in developing photographs) because of its chemical or biological activity
